CustomProfile.Description: Aliens Armageddon is a Raw Thrills light‑gun shooter set during a Xenomorph invasion of Earth. Players automatically progress through four chapters, mowing down ground and flying aliens, manning mounted turrets and collecting flamethrower pickups. The 55‑inch cabinet features force‑feedback guns and LED lighting synced to on‑screen action. Solo or co‑op play and online leaderboards encourage repeat attempts to save humanity.
